subject: CSCI
title: Intro to Computing
info: Problem solving and introduction to programming. Students write simple programs in pseudocode and in one or more programming languages (such as Java, C++ or Scheme). Assumes no programming background and is good preparation for CSci 1113.

subject: CSCI
title: Intro to C/C++
info:
Programming for scientists/engineers. C/C++ programming constructs, object-oriented programming, software development, fundamental numerical techniques. Exercises/examples from various scientific fields.
The online modality for CSci 1113 will only be offered during the summer session.
prereqInfo: Math 1271 or Math 1371 or Math 1571H or instr consent.

subject: CSCI
title: Intro to Programming Concepts
info: Fundamental programming concepts using Python language. Problem solving skills, recursion, object-oriented programming. Algorithm development techniques. Use of abstractions/modularity. Data structures/abstract data types. Develop programs to solve real-world problems.
prereqInfo: concurrent registration is required (or allowed) in MATH 1271 or concurrent registration is required (or allowed) in MATH 1371 or concurrent registration is required (or allowed) in MATH 1571H or instr consent

subject: CSCI
title: Elem Comput Linear Algebra
info: Matrices/linear transformations, basic theory. Linear vector spaces. Inner product spaces. Systems of linear equations, Eigenvalues, singular values. Algorithms/computational matrix methods using MATLAB. Use of matrix methods to solve variety of computer science problems.
prereqInfo: [MATH 1271 or MATH 1371], [1113 or 1133 or knowledge of programming concepts]
